SEEALSO: ORMEvictCollection, ORMEvictQueries, Evict content from secondary cache in Developing ColdFusion Applications
DESCRIPTION: This method is used to evict items for the given entity name, from the secondary cache. If the primary key is specified, then the data of the entity with that primary key is evicted. Primary key should be a value in case of simple primary key or should be a struct in case of composite primary key.
EXAMPLE:
To evict all the cache data of CArtist entity:
<cfset ORMEvictEntity("CArtists")>
To evict the cache data of CArtists entity whose primary key is 1:
<cfset ORMEvictEntity("CArtists", 1)>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Entity name of the persistent CFC
Primary key value of the component
